Class PlayView.PlayPane.iconHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • View.PlayView.PlayPane.iconHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Enclosing class:
    PlayView.PlayPane

    public class PlayView.PlayPane.iconHandler
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
    It is an mouse adapter class to process the mouse operation we only use mouse click.
